title: From Immigration To Abortion: 5 Issues At Stake In The US Election
content: From taxes, to immigration, to abortion -- here are the five key issues which are at stake as Donald Trump and Kamala Harris enter a final sprint in the race for the White House.
summary: From taxes, to immigration, to abortion -- here are the five key issues which are at stake as Donald Trump and Kamala Harris enter a final sprint in the race for the White House.

title: What If Donald Trump Loses US Elections
content: Much of the outside world's focus during the 2024 US election has been on what victory for Donald Trump might look like, but many Americans are fretting about the opposite outcome -- including some of his most vocal opponents.
summary: Much of the outside world's focus during the 2024 US election has been on what victory for Donald Trump might look like, but many Americans are fretting about the opposite outcome -- including some of his most vocal opponents.

title: Wall Street, Tech Royalty Head To Saudi Crown Prince's Event Amid War
content: Saudi Arabia will host the biggest names in finance and technology this coming week in a test of investor appetite for the kingdom's ambitions of transforming itself into a global hub at a time of widening regional conflict.
summary: Saudi Arabia will host the biggest names in finance and technology this coming week in a test of investor appetite for the kingdom's ambitions of transforming itself into a global hub at a time of widening regional conflict.

title: McDonald's Rules Out Beef Caused E. Coli. To Resume Quarter Pounder Sales
content: Beef patties have been ruled out as the source of the E. coli outbreak, McDonald's said on Sunday, adding the fast-food giant will soon resume sales of its quarter-pounder hamburgers.
summary: Beef patties have been ruled out as the source of the E. coli outbreak, McDonald's said on Sunday, adding the fast-food giant will soon resume sales of its quarter-pounder hamburgers.

title: How A Melting Iceberg Is Reshaping Marine Ecosystems
content: A massive iceberg, A-68, which broke off from Antarctica's Larsen C Ice Shelf in 2017, has created a distinctive marine environment during its four-year drift, according to recent scientific analyses.
summary: A massive iceberg, A-68, which broke off from Antarctica's Larsen C Ice Shelf in 2017, has created a distinctive marine environment during its four-year drift, according to recent scientific analyses.

title: How UK Couple's Fight Against Google Cost The Tech Giant 2 Billion Pounds
content: A UK couple has won a 15-year-long legal battle against Google, with the tech giant facing a record 2.4 billion pound fine for market abuse.
summary: A UK couple has won a 15-year-long legal battle against Google, with the tech giant facing a record 2.4 billion pound fine for market abuse.

title: A For Abortion, B For Border: US Election Vocabulary Explained

title: Earth's Biodiversity Crisis: 1 Million Species Face Extinction
content: Over a quarter of plants and animals assessed on the International Union for Conservation of Nature's Red List of threatened species risk extinction.
summary: Over a quarter of plants and animals assessed on the International Union for Conservation of Nature's Red List of threatened species risk extinction.

title: Mossad Chief Heads To Qatar, Israel Continues Multi-Front War: 10 Facts
content:
Israel's Mossad chief is set to visit Qatar to discuss the release of hostages in Gaza, even as Egypt proposed a two-day truce in the Palestinian enclave, as regional tensions simmered.

title: Georgian Opposition Calls For Protest, EU Demands Investigation
content: The Georgian opposition called for protests on Monday and the European Union demanded an investigation into "irregularities" after a disputed legislative vote that showed a win for the ruling party accused of moving towards Russia's orbit.
summary: The Georgian opposition called for protests on Monday and the European Union demanded an investigation into "irregularities" after a disputed legislative vote that showed a win for the ruling party accused of moving towards Russia's orbit.

title: "Wiped Off The Face Of The Earth": How Russia Erased A Ukrainian City
content: Vovchansk had a population of about 20,000 before the war. It now lives only in the memories of the survivors who managed to flee.
summary: Vovchansk had a population of about 20,000 before the war. It now lives only in the memories of the survivors who managed to flee.

title: Bidzina Ivanishvili, Secretive Billionaire Called Georgia's "Puppet Master"
content: When Georgia's richest man first burst into politics 12 years ago, he vowed to "astonish Europe" with the democracy he would bring to the Black Sea nation.
summary: When Georgia's richest man first burst into politics 12 years ago, he vowed to "astonish Europe" with the democracy he would bring to the Black Sea nation.

title: US Man Finds $20 On Ground, Buys Lottery Ticket And Wins $1 Million
content: When Jerry Hicks, a master carpenter from Banner Elk was headed to a convenience store, he found a $20 bill lying on the ground and then he won a lottery.
summary: When Jerry Hicks, a master carpenter from Banner Elk was headed to a convenience store, he found a $20 bill lying on the ground and then he won a lottery.

title: Iran Supreme Leader's Hebrew X Account Suspended, Last Post Was...
content: The Hebrew language account opened by Iran's leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei on social media platform X has been suspended after just two posts, as per Jerusalem Post.
summary: The Hebrew language account opened by Iran's leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei on social media platform X has been suspended after just two posts, as per Jerusalem Post.

title: Man Dials 911 Claiming A Bear Is Chasing Him. He's Now A Murder Suspect
content: The man called 911 and said that he had fallen off of a cliff while running from a bear and that he was injured and partially in the water, leading first responders to a dead body.
summary: The man called 911 and said that he had fallen off of a cliff while running from a bear and that he was injured and partially in the water, leading first responders to a dead body.

title: North Korea Blames South's Military For Drone Intrusion
content: North Korea's defence ministry blamed South Korea's military for sending drones into its territory for political purposes, calling it an infringement upon the country's sovereignty
summary: North Korea's defence ministry blamed South Korea's military for sending drones into its territory for political purposes, calling it an infringement upon the country's sovereignty

title: Egypt Proposes 2-Day Truce In Gaza With Limited Hostage-Prisoner Exchange
content: Egypt has proposed an initial two-day ceasefire in Gaza to exchange four Israeli hostages of Hamas for some Palestinian prisoners, Egypt's president said on Sunday as Israeli military strikes killed 45 Palestinians across the enclave.
summary: Egypt has proposed an initial two-day ceasefire in Gaza to exchange four Israeli hostages of Hamas for some Palestinian prisoners, Egypt's president said on Sunday as Israeli military strikes killed 45 Palestinians across the enclave.

title: Israel Army Says 5 Soldiers Killed In "Combat" In South Lebanon
content: The Israeli military on Sunday said five soldiers were killed in southern Lebanon, bringing to 37 the death toll for soldiers fighting there since the start of ground operations on September 30.
summary: The Israeli military on Sunday said five soldiers were killed in southern Lebanon, bringing to 37 the death toll for soldiers fighting there since the start of ground operations on September 30.

title: King Charles To Continue Foreign Tours After Being Diagnosed With Cancer
content: King Charles III's cancer diagnosis will not prevent him flying abroad next year for foreign visits, a Buckingham Palace official said, as the monarch wrapped up a tour of Australia and Samoa.
summary: King Charles III's cancer diagnosis will not prevent him flying abroad next year for foreign visits, a Buckingham Palace official said, as the monarch wrapped up a tour of Australia and Samoa.

title: US Man Sues Alaska Airlines After His Dog Dies During Flight
content: The sudden relocation caused significant distress to Ash, who began exhibiting signs of respiratory distress, including heavy panting and gasping for air.
summary: The sudden relocation caused significant distress to Ash, who began exhibiting signs of respiratory distress, including heavy panting and gasping for air.
